page.title: 14Housing Estates,Ridgewood.
page.content: Building started on the site of a {Nursery}in 1983. The plan is to compl- ete the Estate by 1987. The site is about 7 acres; it usually takes five months to build a house depending on the weather and the size of the house. The houses are either terraced or de- tatched. The 4 & 5 bedroom houses have double glazing but not the smallest. The most expensive houses are{Â£95450 and the cheapest{Â£35450.}Some have in- creased by Â£15000 in only five months. A{'Self Build'}development began in June 1982 on the grounds of a Nursing Home. An advertisement in a local newspaper asked for people willing to build their own homes. Altogether 62 houses were built. To get the Scheme finished within 18 months the men worked every weekend from 7.30am until at least 5.30pm, sometimes later and for 3 evenings a week.
